product_name: Merrell Mix Master Tuff Trail-Running Shoes - Men's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Balanced between traditional shoes and barefoot shoes, the Merrell Mix Master Tuff Trail-Running Shoes are built to handle rugged trails when you're out for a run. Mesh and synthetic leather uppers have bellowed tongues to keep debris from getting in. Aegis Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment helps keep odors at bay. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Low-profile Merrell Float(TM) EVA midsole is a touch thinner than previous Merrell midsoles for enhanced feel and responsiveness; Air Cushion heel pockets help absorb shock. 3.5mm deep lugs provide good feel and traction on streets and trails. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. Overstock.
short_description: Balanced between traditional shoes and barefoot shoes, the Merrell Mix Master Tuff Trail-Running Shoes are built to handle rugged trails when you're out for a run.
